title: BACE Hires Sales Industry Veteran
text:
Innovative Leader Continues BACE’s Expansion
CHARLOTTE, N.C.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- BACE, LLC, a leading global manufacturer of heavy-duty balers and compactors for use in the recycling and waste-management industries, welcomes Stefin Sobel as the Company’s Director of Sales for North America. Sobel will be responsible for sales & marketing growth, service program expansion, new product exploration and IntelliBACE™, BACE’s Patent Pending Business Intelligence and Analytic Platform.
Sobel joins the BACE team with over 25 years of proven Sales leadership in the areas of national account and waste and recycling equipment sales.
"I am very excited to join BACE, I have watched them become an industry disruptor, while continually driving innovation. BACE’s IntelliBACE™ platform and their unique service program is changing the industry. My entire career has been spent providing quality equipment and services to the waste and recycling industry. Joining an organization like BACE creates a unique opportunity to leverage my expertise,” said Sobel.
Gregory Leon, BACE’s Sr. Vice President of Sales & Marketing, states, “We are fortunate to be able to attract a leader like Stefin. His proven sales leadership will accelerate our penetration into national accounts and continue our service program growth. Stefin will also be a valuable asset to help us expand our remanufacturing program.”
About BACE
BACE is a leading global manufacturer of heavy-duty balers and compactors for use in the recycling and waste-management industries. The BACE headquarters is located at 322 W32nd Street, Charlotte, North Carolina 28206.
